channel.title: Personals on Eckhart's site
channel.description: Recent content in Personals on Eckhart's site

item.title: About me
item.description: I’m originally from downstate Illinois, where I dropped out of high school and went to college. From time to time I have bounced around between three continents. In my free time I enjoy scuba diving, ham radio, international travel, reading excellent writing (here is a reading list), and the great outdoors. Above: I set up a WSPR (low-power) radio beacon with a dipole antenna and a Raspberry Pi in my apartment.
